sentences.en: His observations of fungi in their natural habitat and his methods of culturing them enabled him to work out their developemt and life cycles, thus laying down the foundations of modern mycology .
sentences.cn: 他在真菌的天然栖息地观察真菌，并通过培养真菌的方法来获得有关它们发育和生活史的相关知识，继而建立了现代真菌学的基础。

sentences.en: It is active in under- and postgraduate training in the fields of botany, mycology , and plant physiology.
sentences.cn: 该所积极参于植物学，真菌学，和植物生理学领域的本科生和研究生训练。

sentences.en: The Fifth Workshop was attended by some 35 participants , drawn from among food mycology and related disciplines around the world.
sentences.cn: 大约35个参加者参加了第5 间工场，从全世界的食品真菌学和有关的学科之中汲取。

sentences.en: Within the field of infectious diseases, medical mycology has experienced significant growth over the last decade.
sentences.cn: 在传染病的领域内, 医学真菌学已经在过去十年经历显著的发展.

words.tran_cn: 霉菌毒素，真菌毒素；毒枝菌素

trans.tran_cn: <微>真菌学，（真菌的）结构或特性
trans.tran_en: the study of different types of  fungus
